line: joey has been holding his breath for almost four minutes
what are yo you trying to kill me
pheebs i wanna ask you something
well since i’m movin’ out and and you’re so beautiful
how about i move in with you
well that would be great but then what do we do about denise
hey what is with the secrecy phoebe
and what about this denise is she cute
how can you have a roommate that none of us know anything about
maybe because you never listen to anything that i say
i talk about her all the time
hey rach listen i was thinkin’ uh i’m gonna have an extra room over at my place
yeah why don’t you move in with me
we could stay up late watch movies and you know about naked thursday’s right
yeah yeah i think i’m gonna find my own place
i thought naked thursday’s was just our thing man
so what did rachel say when you told her you were still married to her
umm she took it really well
you didn’t tell her did you
of course not because you’re in love with her
i am not in love with her
she was very upset about having to move out so i eh didn’t tell her we were still married because she would only get more upset
i i just comforted her as a friend
what do you mean comforted her
it’s nothing i just gave her a hug
a classic sign of love the hug
it’s also a sign of friendship
yeah not in your case lovey loverson
okay just tell me this did you or did you not smell her hair
ninety percent of a women’s pheromones come out the top of her head
that’s why that’s why women are shorter
so that men will fall in love when they hug them
oh come on ross you’re a scientist
i was hugging her as a friend
it’s not my fault her her hair got in my face she’s got a lot of it and it smells all all uh coconutty
oh that doesn’t mean i have feelings for rachel
maybe it means i have feelings for coconuts
but just be careful all right
rachel’s not in the same place you are
if the place you are referring too is being in love then she is in the same place as me because i am not in that place
okay i didn’t understand that but y’know maybe that’s ‘cause you were speaking the secret language of love
dude some guy just called for you
how about thanks for taking the message
okay listen y’know when you move in rachel’s room is gonna be empty you wanna talk about what we want to do with it
okay i was thinking we should have a beautiful guest room right
with a mahogany sleigh bed and bedside tables with flowers on them all the time
and we could have a roll top desk with comment cards on them so people could say how much they loved staying here
okay whatever i really haven’t thought about it that much
i was thinking maybe maybe maybe it could be a game room y’know
i mean you can buy old arcade games like uh like space invaders and asteroids for 200 the real ones
okay so you mean no as in gee chandler what an interesting idea
let’s discuss it before we reject it completely
interesting idea umm talk about it but no
i just don’t think arcade games go in the beautiful guest room
the beautiful guest room is gonna be filled with antiques
which is why asteroids is perfect
what do you have against the beautiful guest room
i don’t have anything against the beautiful guest room especially since everybody we know lives about 30 seconds away
no i’m not mocking you or you beautiful guest room
nothing monica and i had a stupid fight
but you’re still moving in together right
because my ad came out today
female roommate non smoker non ugly
i just figured y’know after living with you it’d be an interesting change of pace to have a female roommate y’know
someone i can learn from someone someone who’s different than me
and what’s more different than me a guy who’s not 19 than say a girl who is 19
not just a hat rack my friend
pheebs i have to ask you
umm i’m trying to move that pencil
pheebs this whole apartment thing is just a nightmare
every place i can afford comes with a roommate who is a freak
i mean look at this wanted
female roommate non smoker non ugly
two bedroom two bath must be non smoker satan worshipers okay oh yeah but it’s on the ground floor
rach uh you still looking for a place
okay there’s this guy warren from the museum and he’s going on a dig for like two years and he’s got this great place he needs to sublet
i’d love to live at warren’s
if you wanna thank something thank the volcano that erupted thousands of years ago killing but perfectly preserving an entire civilization
i am gonna call him right now
i don’t know what you’re talking about
umm i’m talking about that which you already know but won’t admit
you love her again you re love her
look i do not re love her
i can’t believe you won’t just admit it
okay just promise me that you won’t do anything stupid
why would i do anything stupid
well the apartment is already subletted
i mean this is just hopeless
i would love to live with you ross that’s that’s great
well i’m i’m just glad i could y’know help you out
i’m i’m so happy for you guys
this is so so not stupid
ross ross you have no idea what this means to me
i mean i mean i was gonna be homeless
hero i uh i don’t know well all right
oh i have to go tell monica what a wonderful brother she has
you’re gonna say things now aren’t ya
but i should tell you this this exact same thing happened to my roommate denise
she moved in with a guy who was secretly married to her and he said he didn’t love her but he really did and it just blew up
and that’s how she ended up living with me
hi listen i’m sorry about before
i don’t need to have a game room
i mean when i was a kid i only played those games because i couldn’t get girls and now i can ‘em now i have you
not not that i think that i have you or think of you as property in any sort of way i see women
listen we don’t have to make that a guest room we can think of something to do with the room together
we can easily think of a way for us both to enjoy the room
we don’t have to come up with this now
why don’t we think about changes we can make in the living room
yeah i mean we’re gonna have to move around some furniture to make room for my chair
you’re you’re you’re gonna bring the barca lounger over here
well it’s a set and they should probably stay together
then i’ll just bring them both over
see now now you’re taking them away from their home
i’ll get up in the morning put on your clothes and head off to work
yeah that’s it that’s it everything will be mine
i’m talking about the barca lounger
look it is not my fault that your chairs are incredibly ugly
i won’t bring over the chairs
i wouldn’t want to ruin the ambiance over here at grandma’s place
everything on your application looks really good ohh
just one last question umm are you and your friends gonna be over here all the time like partying and hanging out
oh don’t worry i’m not really a party girl
now look don’t be just blurtin’ stuff out
i want you to really think about your answers
you can call off the roommate search
oh don’t listen to him he’s just some guy who really wants the apartment but i don’t think he’s gonna get it
why did you take the shower curtain down
oh listen i was just clearing some space for your stuff
oh thanks but listen i was just at monica’s and she and chandler had a big fight and they’re not moving in
what do you mean they’re not moving in
they they’re still moving in right
no no they just had a big blowout over what to do with my room
yeah i feel kinda bad for them but i’m also really psyched ‘cause i don’t have to move in here
oh no yeah no that part’s great
what’s all this about you guys fighting
is this really over a room
i mean that is so silly
well apparently not and i can’t just stand by and watch two people i care about very much be hurt over something that is so silly
i mean enough of the silliness
well why don’t you tell her to stop being silly
two very good points look i’ve known you both a long time and i’ve never seen either of you one millionth as happy as you’ve been since you’ve got together
do you really want to throw that all away over a room
now wh what is more important love or silliness
well we are fond of the silliness but we also have a soft spot for the love
now chandler you you wanna live with monica right
and mon you wanna live with chandler don’t ya
a verbal contract is binding in the state of new york
so i understand you’re looking for a place
oh i was going to offer you my apartment
you’re never gonna believe it uh monica and chandler are moving in again
that’s great news right i mean for them
yeah but on the bright side we get to be roommates again
y’know umm uh umm about that umm ross i really appreciate your offer to let me move in and everything but don’t you think it’s gonna be weird
why why why would it why would it be weird
it would be weird if we were still in that place i mean are you still in that place
we’re just two friends who happen to be roommates
okay but ross eventually you and i are gonna be dating
i’m gonna have a boyfriend you’re gonna have a girlfriend
but y’know what if you think it’s gonna be okay we’ll just work out a system
y’know it’ll be like college i’ll hang a hanger on the door and put a sign come back later i’m gettin’ lucky
yeah i didn’t think of that
so are you sure about this whole moving in thing
i mean it’s a really big step
he’s being silly because he knows that we enjoy the silliness
no i i i’m serious okay
you move in you start fighting over stupid game rooms next thing y’know you break up
ross you were right before it was just a stupid fight about a room
okay there are no stupid fights
this isn’t about the room this is about what the room represents
and unfortunately this room could destroy you
transcriber’s note i think that’s what he says if anyone thinks any different let me know
‘cause that sentence doesn’t make sense to me but i played it 20 times and that’s what i came up with
i just don’t want to see you guys break up
which you will do if you move in together but that’s what you want there’s nothing i can do
you still want to move in together right
scared me out of ever wanting to live with him
come here i want to show you something
this is where i thought the barca lounger could go
you see you could see the tv and it’s still walking distance to the kitchen
i want to show you something too
y’know those big big uh road signs that say merge
so i was thinking that we could get one of those signs and hang it over our bed
because that’s you and i together
i found you in my bed
little black little black little black little black little black curly hair
now if you want to receive e mails about my upcoming shows then please give me money so i can buy a computer
so umm where are the other guys
umm well let’s see monica and chandler are occupied
i really think it’s great they work things out
there’s no breaking them up is there
hey can i borrow the key to your house so i can run across the street and make a copy
because once i make a copy there’s no turning back
yeah get out of here before i change my mind
umm listen ross do you really think this moving in with rachel is a good idea
yeah well maybe you should go back
rachel moves in and before you know it you’re right where you don’t want to be
ehh i don’t i don’t think so
she’s already talked about y’know dating other guys
then she’s gonna come home all weepy and you’ll be tellin’ her oh that’s okay
yeah well m maybe you’re right
i am telling you ross she is definitely gonna fall in love with you again
now is that what you want
hold on i’m gonna make your life much easier
all right well the place was closed
uh rach why don’t you just move in with me
no no no no no no no no it’s okay i mean i look rach i know i scared you off with that whole naked thursday’s thing but we don’t have to do that
well it would be easier to move just right across the hall
wait a minute unless you’re thinking about naked wednesday’s
thursday’s clearly not good for ya pick a day
thanks for comin’ back umm okay there have been a lot of people interested in the room but i have narrowed it down and you are one of the finalists
okay now before i make my final decision i uh i just want to make sure our personalities match
okay so i made up a little test
now i’m gonna say a word and then you say the first thing that comes to mind
no no no so close though but bye bye
